thread.title: Best hotel in London
thread.title_full: Best hotel in London - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 748mudassara
title: Best hotel in London
text: This place is just stunning, we had the one room apartment and it was everything we could have wished for. The staff are all amazing and all of them knew my name and that was a lovely touch. The bar is very nice and lively with live music and a great menu of drinks on offer with superb attentive staff.
